channel.title: cornbread on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in cornbread on Barefoot Rob

item.title: cornbread day
item.description: ##09:25 Saturday 02 March 2013 It’s a Saturday as I write this, and it happens to be a lazy Saturday as we’ve got nothing planned, per se. Lin is making cornbread, and I just watched the first episode where Nibbler turns out to be smart. Interestingly, given that the characters don’t remember the happenings of the episode, I don’t remember ever having seen this episode before, though I had seen the one before it.
